setup_script_description: sets focus on a link after the grid
specific_user_instruction: Move keyboard focus onto the first non-header cell in the grid.
output_assertions: Name 'Transactions January 1 through January 6' is conveyed
Text of the first column header ('Date') is conveyed
Text of the first cell ('01-Jan-16') is conveyed
coordinates of the first cell (column 1, row 2) are conveyed
